Title: The Ox-Bow Incident
Writer: Lamar Trotti (written for the screen by), Walter Van Tilburg Clark (from the novel by)
Actors: Henry Fonda, Dana Andrews, Mary Beth Hughes, Anthony Quinn
Plot: When a posse captures three men suspected of killing a local farmer, they become strongly divided over whether or not to lynch the men.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 1 nomination.
